subtitleNullable: Top 100 Anime Movies and its rating, length, no. of votes, year, genre, etc.
descriptionNullable:
Based on Oxford dictionary, **anime** is a style of Japanese film and television animation, typically aimed at adults as well as children. 

## About Dataset
This dataset contains the top 100 anime movies based on their rating. It also contains the anime's rating, number of votes, year, length of the movies and more.

### Columns Attributes

| Column | Meaning |
| -- | -- |
| rank | the anime's rank |
| title | the anime's title |
| rating | the anime's rating |
| votes | the number of reviewers that rated this anime |
| year | year this anime was released |
| minutes | the length of this anime in minutes |
| genre | the genre of this anime |
| gross | the gross of this anime |

## Methodology
This dataset was acquired using a web scraping tool called Beautiful soup and scraped IMDB website showing top anime movies
